description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军事委员会委员、中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: A general (shangjiang) of the People's Liberation Army (PLA) who served as a member of the Central Military Commission and director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省，是于永波的出生地，现为瓦房店市。
description.en: Located in Liaoning Province, China, it is the birthplace of Yu Yongbo, now known as Wafangdian City.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第二次国共内战时期在中国东北地区建立的武装力量。
description.en: An armed force established by the Communist Party of China in Northeast China during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一，由东北民主联军改称。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War, renamed from the Northeast Democratic United Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一，由东北野战军改称。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War, renamed from the Northeast Field Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十二集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十二集团军
en: 42nd Group Army of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一个集团军，于永波曾长期在该部队任职并担任政治委员。
description.en: A group army of the PLA Ground Force where Yu Yongbo served for a long time and was its political commissar.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争中派遣的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces deployed by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 于永波作为中国人民志愿军的一员参加了此战争。
description.en: Yu Yongbo participated in this war as a member of the People's Volunteer Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防科学技术大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科学技术大学
解放军第四政治干部学校
中国人民解放军第四政治干部学校

description.zh-cn: 中国顶尖的军事院校之一。于永波曾在此的前身解放军第四政治干部学校学习。
description.en: One of China's top military academies. Yu Yongbo studied at its predecessor, the 4th PLA Political Cadre School.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军广州军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军广州军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾在中国南方设立的大军区之一。
description.en: One of the former major military regions of the People's Liberation Army, located in southern China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾在中国东部设立的大军区之一。
description.en: One of the former major military regions of the People's Liberation Army, located in eastern China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾经的四大总部之一，负责军队的政治工作。
description.en: Formerly one of the four general departments of the PLA, responsible for the political work of the army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest national military command and control authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 国务院军队转业干部安置工作小组

zh-cn: 国务院军队转业干部安置工作小组
en: State Council working group for the resettlement of demobilized military cadres

description.zh-cn: 负责军队转业干部安置工作的国务院议事协调机构。
description.en: A coordinating body of the State Council responsible for the resettlement of demobilized military cadres.

nodes.id: 全国打击走私领导小组

zh-cn: 全国打击走私领导小组
en: National Leading Group for Combating Smuggling

description.zh-cn: 负责协调全国打击走私工作的领导机构。
description.en: A leading body responsible for coordinating national anti-smuggling efforts.

description.zh-cn: 1994年发生于北京建国门地区的枪击事件，于永波参与了处置工作。
description.en: A shooting incident that occurred in the Jianguomen area of Beijing in 1994, which Yu Yongbo was involved in handling.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会
en: 13th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1987年至1992年间的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China between 1987 and 1992.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会
en: 14th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1992年至1997年间的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China between 1992 and 1997.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十五届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十五届中央委员会
en: 15th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1997年至2002年间的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China between 1997 and 2002.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，于永波在南京军区政治部主任职位上的前任。
description.en: A general in the PLA, Yu Yongbo's predecessor as the Director of the Political Department of the Nanjing Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，于永波在南京军区政治部主任职位上的继任。
description.en: A general in the PLA, Yu Yongbo's successor as the Director of the Political Department of the Nanjing Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，于永波在总政治部主任职位上的前任。
description.en: A general (shangjiang) of the PLA, Yu Yongbo's predecessor as the Director of the General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军事委员会副主席，于永波在总政治部主任职位上的继任。
description.en: A general (shangjiang) of the PLA, former Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, and Yu Yongbo's successor as the Director of the General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 于永波作为中共军队的一员参加了此战争。
description.en: Yu Yongbo participated in this war as a member of the CCP's armed forces.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军衔。
description.en: The highest rank in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的高级军衔之一。
description.en: One of the senior ranks in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军1955年至1965年间的校级军官军衔之一。
description.en: A field officer rank in the People's Liberation Army from 1955 to 1965.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军1955年至1965年间的尉级军官军衔之一。
description.en: A company officer rank in the People's Liberation Army from 1955 to 1965.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军1955年至1965年间的尉级军官军衔之一。
description.en: A company officer rank in the People's Liberation Army from 1955 to 1965.

description.zh-cn: 于永波于1931年9月出生于辽宁复县。
description.en: Yu Yongbo was born in Fu County, Liaoning in September 1931.

description.zh-cn: 1947年9月加入东北民主联军南满独立师。
description.en: Joined the South Manchuria Independent Division of the Northeast Democratic United Army in September 1947.

description.zh-cn: 于1948年9月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in September 1948.

position.zh-cn: 第四十二军一二四师三七零团政治处宣传股干事
position.en: Officer, Propaganda Section, Political Department, 370th Regiment, 124th Division, 42nd Army

description.zh-cn: 1950年12月作为中国人民志愿军第四十二军的一员参加朝鲜战争。
description.en: Participated in the Korean War in December 1950 as a member of the 42nd Army of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防科学技术大学

description.zh-cn: 1953年9月至1954年7月在解放军第四政治干部学校业务一队学习。
description.en: Studied at the 4th PLA Political Cadre School from September 1953 to July 1954.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十二集团军

description.zh-cn: 于永波曾长期在第四十二军及其下属部队任职，历任宣传干事、科长、团政委、师政委等，并于1983年5月升任该军政治委员。
description.en: Yu Yongbo served for a long time in the 42nd Army and its subordinate units, holding positions such as propaganda officer, section chief, regiment political commissar, division political commissar, and was promoted to Army Political Commissar in May 1983.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军广州军区

description.zh-cn: 1978年12月任中国人民解放军广州军区司令部办公室主任。
description.en: In December 1978, he was appointed Director of the Headquarters Office of the PLA Guangzhou Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 1985年6月任中国人民解放军南京军区政治部主任。
description.en: In June 1985, he was appointed Director of the Political Department of the PLA Nanjing Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 于1989年11月任总政治部副主任，1992年10月升任主任。
description.en: He became Deputy Director of the General Political Department in November 1989 and was promoted to Director in October 1992.

description.zh-cn: 1992年10月至2002年11月任中央军委委员。
description.en: Served as a member of the Central Military Commission from October 1992 to November 2002.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会
中国共产党第十四届中央委员会
中国共产党第十五届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 作为东北民主联军、东北野战军、第四野战军成员参与了第二次国共内战。
description.en: Participated in the Second Chinese Civil War as a member of the Northeast Democratic United Army, Northeast Field Army, and Fourth Field Army.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国人民志愿军成员参与了朝鲜战争。
description.en: Participated in the Korean War as a member of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 参与处置1994年的建国门事件。
description.en: Participated in the handling of the 1994 Jianguomen incident.

description.zh-cn: 1985年6月，于永波接替魏金山出任中国人民解放军南京军区政治部主任。
description.en: In June 1985, Yu Yongbo succeeded Wei Jinshan as Director of the Political Department of the PLA Nanjing Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 1989年8月，兰保景接替于永波出任中国人民解放军南京军区政治部主任。
description.en: In August 1989, Lan Baojing succeeded Yu Yongbo as Director of the Political Department of the PLA Nanjing Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 1992年11月，于永波接替杨白冰出任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: In November 1992, Yu Yongbo succeeded Yang Baibing as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 2002年11月，徐才厚接替于永波出任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: In November 2002, Xu Caihou succeeded Yu Yongbo as Director of the PLA General Political Department.
